message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a limited time at a special price of $12,000. I believe it will be highly valuable for you.
Hi Alice,  $12,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product. This is my best offer, let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $8,500 is too low for me.  I could consider letting it go for $11,000. This is a very competitive price for a product of this quality.

Alice,  $11,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm really interested in the product, but my budget is capped at $9,000.  If you're willing to come down to that price, we can make a deal.  Let me know what you think.
